## Total Number of Babies Named "Oliver" in Utah Over All Years

This report provides the total number of babies named "Oliver" in the state of Utah for all years.

```{python}
# Import necessary libraries
import pandas as pd

# Load the CSV file
df = pd.read_csv("names_year.csv")

# Filter for the name 'Oliver'
oliver_df = df[df['name'] == 'Oliver']

# Sum the number of babies named 'Oliver' in Utah (UT) across all years
total_oliver_utah = oliver_df['UT'].sum()

# Show the result
total_oliver_utah
